Additional information: Grassland used for grazing. Cow dung present. Next to A38.
Detector did not record past 25khz
Middle of field (barley and beans). Cane not long enough - could only attach mic just above  barley
Sheds and horses in adjacent fields. At a hedgerow junction next to a little-used lane.
Hedge and trees overgrown. Overgrown path nearby, private and not used for 10 years.

Unable to locate detector in specified location due to wheat being harvested. Positioned on edge of field at location shown on map. When collected, hedge had been cut. Retrieved box but could not find microphone.
Little human activity. A38 nearby but not visible. Cattle in adjacent fields. Detector just set to june

Human activity type: Campers, walkers, some vehicles on campsite
Additional information: Campground with low level lighting all night. Arable and some sheep. Didn't see livestock but sheep and cattle present
Residential estate of 131 properties, lawned gardens with shrubs/trees. Adjacent fields with sheep.
Derelict barn in eyesight but not in same field
Quarry
Polytunnels next to field. Minimal human activity.
Water, grassland, orchard, sheep in adjacent field. Edge of tree/hedgerow junction. Stream Mill Leat.

Buildings 50m away. Area asked to position detector impenetrable (brambles) so attached microphone to perimeter fence. Trees were less towards middle of wooded site with a clearer area only about 1m high (under the tree canopy).
Beside bridge crossing A38
50m to main road.
Roadside
Mini woodland edge. Small copse behind. Cattle adjacent.
Sheep in adjacent field. Water, a few houses in adjacent field

Could not place detector in required location as field planted with head height maize. Detector located on edge of field.
High point overlooking Buckfastleigh. At hedgerow junction. Cattle pasture all around.

Additional information: Water about 200yds away. Dung present. 150yds from quiet lane.
1/3 way down hedgerow near large ash tree. Adjacent tree lined hedge beside road. Sheep in adjacent field, horses in another (small equestrian small holding)

Farmhouse, sheds/barns 250m below. Very windy blowing directly in mic. High site overlooking valley. Nearby organic manure heap. Microphone cable detached very easily when collected.

Hedge on both sides. Trees further down. Quiet unmetalled road nearby. Detector located slightly further north than on map. Approx location marked. When collected, micro was coiled on top of box, no bamboo cane. Bracken along hedgerow knocked down.
Polytunnels in adjacent area. Corner of a hedgerow. Lane on other side of hedge.
